title: Marvel Studios' What If? Episode 6 Review - What If Killmonger Rescued Tony Stark?
description:
Go to http://hbom.ax/kindafunnydc to sign up for HBO Max and start streaming today!

Joey and the boys give their reaction to episode 6 of the fourth ever MCU Marvel Studios TV show What If...?
